sentences.english: Ask them for the little mill that stands behind their door.
sentences.chinese: 詢問那個小磨他們門後立着。

sentences.english: However, it's more polite than a direct request.
sentences.chinese: 但是，比起直接的詢問，這是一種更爲禮貌的請求。

sentences.english: Ask how many active Scrum teams they have at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 因此要詢問他們此時有多少活躍的Scrum團隊。

sentences.english: My father always asks me if I got a girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我父親經常詢問我是否找到了女朋友。

sentences.english: He was taken away to the court to be cross-examined.
sentences.chinese: 他被帶到法庭上去詢問了。

sentences.english: With no enquiry, you are deemed to have fully understood the terms and conditions of this insurance contract.
sentences.chinese: 如未詢問，則視同已經對合同內容完全理解並無異議。

sentences.english: I am writing to find out the possibility of our having a brief meeting some time next week…
sentences.chinese: 我去信詢問一下我們能否在下週某個時間見面。

sentences.english: Asking weight of wenman is a big no-no in the world.
sentences.chinese: 在美國向一個女士詢問她的年齡是一個很大的禁忌。

sentences.english: I inquired about how many suitcases I would be allowed to bring and what the living accommodations would be.
sentences.chinese: 我詢問我可以帶多少個手提箱，食宿條件如何。

sentences.english: Asking them if they prefer smoking or non-smoking table.
sentences.chinese: 並詢問客人需要坐吸菸區還是無煙區。

sentences.english: You may also want to inquire about scheduled book reports or upcoming projects.
sentences.chinese: 可能您也想詢問是否要寫讀書報告或者其他的作業。

sentences.english: He asked if Mr. Dimon could speak with Mr. Schwartz.
sentences.chinese: 他詢問迪蒙能否與施瓦茨通話。

sentences.english: You may have to ask several people in order to determine the common denominators.
sentences.chinese: 你可能需要去詢問好幾個人來確定他們所說的共同點。

sentences.english: How, Thompson asked, could PayPal capture more of that business?
sentences.chinese: 湯普森詢問貝寶怎樣才能抓住更多的生意機會？

sentences.english: You turn to your partner and say “why did you hide my keys?”
sentences.chinese: 你會轉向你的同屋，並詢問“你爲什麼藏我的鑰匙？”

sentences.english: First declarative programming asks the user what they want to do.
sentences.chinese: 首先，聲明式編程詢問用戶他們想要做什麼事。

definition: to question closely/to investigate in detail/to examine minutely/to get to the heart of the matter
to ask about/to make some inquiries/to ask around
investigation/inquiry/to investigate/to survey/survey/(opinion) poll/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
to doubt (sth)/to be skeptical of/to have one's doubts/to harbor suspicions/to suspect that
